import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import DisplayError from './DisplayError' import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; function AddProfile(){ const [ profile, setProfile ] = useState({ data: { skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '', cfUserName: '', cfRating: '', cfMaxRating: '', cfRank: '', ccUserName: '', ccRating: '', ccMaxRating: '', ccRank: '' }, errors: {}, }) const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { const res1 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codeforces/${codingProfile.cfUserName}`) if(res1.data.status==='Failed'){ setProfile({ ...profile.errors, cfUserNameError: 'Please enter valid codeforces username' }) } const res2 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codechef/${codingProfile.ccUserName}`) if(res2.data.status==='Failed'){ setErrors({ ...errors, ccUserNameError: 'Please enter valid codechef username' }) } //console.log(errors.cfUserNameError) console.log(res1.data.status) console.log(res2.data.status) } catch( error ) { console.log(error.response) } } return (
